column3: 2015 by marlan gary leave a condolence courtney lamont elmore was born july 1

column11: nephew and cousin. he loved rapping and was always in the studio with his cousin da. juan. courtney loved his family. his awesome personality touched many lives. courtney had a way of making everyone around him smile and laugh. courtney will be truly missed by his daughters
column12: family and friends. courtney was preceded in death by his great grandmother mittie lee elmore
column14: orlinda jabbar and brenda elmore. courtney leaves to celebrate his life daughters
